data.title: Second time around
data.text: This is the second time I've had Gino's....not impressed. My order was wrong, the quality of the pizza was low and even my children were voicing the difference. I ordered an 18in meatlovers w/o Italian sausage. It was covered with Italian sausage which I discovered once I returned to hotel and the toppings went spread out to the crust. First impressions are important but inconsistency is disappointing.
I had yet another amazing philly steak and cheese sub today. The 6in is huge. They know how to make a very meaty sandwich.  Well worth the money
